snippet: Thomas, who broke into an N.H.L. lineup at 32, emerged as a top goalie when he won the Vezina Trophy in 2009.
abstract: Boston Bruins goaltender Tim Thomas announces that he will sit out next season.
lead_paragraph: Thomas, who broke into an N.H.L. lineup at 32, emerged as a top goalie when he won the Vezina Trophy in 2009.

headline.seo: Boston Bruins Goaltender Tim Thomas to Take Year Off
headline.main: Bruins’ Thomas to Take Year Off
headline.print_headline: Bruins’ Thomas to Take Year Off
